pages.text: The Shiba is a new firendly dog that can be found in Mountain Biomes.$(br2)They can be tamed with Bones and interacted in the same way that regular Wolfes but will in addition also fetch any arrows or tridents after they land and bring them back to you.$(br2)If you are holding a torch, Shibas will also look for dark spots and get mad at them.
They will also lay down if you're having them sit on a bed!
